content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing a little after 5 pm on 11/13/2013 when a very large bright white light caught my eye in the southern sky. it was about 30 degrees up above the horizon. no other stars were out yet. this thing appeared to spin very slowly. it would get very, very bright and slowly go dim only to get very bright again. at first i thought it was the planet venus or maybe the star vega, but then i noticed it had 3-4 smaller lights that were a reddish orange circling it. the smaller objects also appeared as stars but were very much dimmer as compared to the large white light. i watched these objects from 5:15pm to 7:30pm and they appeared to be stationary or slowly following a 90 degree arc from 30 degrees above the horizon due south to treetop level in the sw. the large white object appeared to land as it went down behind a hill and then went out, but i can't verify that since i could not actually see beyond the hillside. i have seen these objects for a little over a month now. my first sighting was around october 5, 2013 when i noticed it just barely above tree top level in the sw. it has been out every clear night since then. it is only obscured by heavy cloud cover or rain. i did get a good look at it through a pair of tasco 10x50 binoculars. it appeared to be a huge triangle with a row of lights on the back that were pulsating bright white. the surface seemed to be shimmering with light. it had a large rotating white strobe on the bottom that was shining down toward the ground. this thing would slowly rotate and the lights would go dim only to get bright again. the smaller objects seemed to be orbiting it. where i live we have fort leonard wood army camp 20 miles to the sw, and whiteman air force base 200 miles to the nw, so i don't know if these are aircraft or not. i did not hear any sound, but i did notice a lot of other aircraft activity in the area after the objects had left, and the scanner chatter on the military air bands was quite heavy. sure would like to find out just to put my mind at ease.
content.summary: Bright star like object with accompanying dim red objects in sw sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony, having a sigaret, when i unexpectedly saw the fast moving triangular object in the sky. i immediatly thought that it is not an airplane, besause it didnt have any similarity to aircrafts i have seen so far. it was very quiet windless night and there was no noise from the streets. still i didnt hear any sound from the object.  it felt almost ghostly. 

streets were brightly lighted and the object was flying only 100-200 meters above the ground (streetlights were reflecting from it like they reflect from the clouds), so i had clear view of the object. it was the size of a  large airplane. it was a perfect black isosceles triangle with straight sides. on every angle it had smaller triangle shapes in gray color. it had no lights and i had strong feeling that i was not ment to see it. 

i saw it only for approx 10 seconds, after that it disappeard behind the buildings. after it disappeard, i searched the internet, hoping to find similar sightings, but i could'nt find the exact match.

i also add my sketch of the ufo and excuse my poor english.
content.summary: Triangular ufo sighting in tallinn lasnam√§e on september 28th 2013 at 2am

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing outside my trailer smoking a cigarette. as always, i was star gazing. looking for shooting stars and satellites. i cant recall if it made a hiss or a static sound, then i noticed a chevron shape moving in the sky. my first thought was that it was a flock of birds flying south for the winter. then i noticed that there wasn't any wings flapping or a break in the formation. then i thought, "what the hell is that?" 
 i couldn't make out much detail of the object, the chevron shape i saw was the leading edge of the craft reflecting light. it was at about 3,000 ft altitude moving steadily from the north east, heading south west. i followed it by the way it blocked out the stars. the size was the most impressive. as i followed it it went directly over town, that's when i noticed that the back of the craft was rectangular. i knew then it wasn't ours. or anything i know of in our military's inventory.And the size was scary, something that big moving so quietly and fast. it flew over a baseball field here, i believe it couldn't have landed in the field it was so big.
 it took a moment or two to realize what i just saw. i felt a little  scared, awed,confused, mostly excited. when i couldn't see that object or any other in the area, i went back inside and told my girlfriend what i just saw.
 i followed the object from first sight to where i had to lean around the front of the trailer to follow it. when it was over town that's when i noticed the rectangular shape and the width of it. i don't recall if i looked away, or if it just disappeared?? after i lost sight of it i looked at my cellphone and noted the time and date.
content.summary: Was out smoking a cigarette, star gazing. noticed movement out of the corner of my eye.

content.detailedDescription: My stepson was working on his vehicle out on the street in front of my home . i went out to see how he was doing as i was having computer issues which ended up for no apparent reason . anyway i looked up and said oh they are spraying chemtrails again and i seen this what looked like a flock of geese , so i said check out that flock of birds they look like they are flying in a strange pattern . my stepson said not only that they are awfully high for birds , so i ran into the house and grabbed my binoculars . i came out and looked at them again and noticed that they shined sort of but were a opaque like color like a pearl essence type of color and so i pulled the binoculars down and i said those are not birds they are some strange looking air craft and we were watching them fly across the sky when suddenly they all just disappeared ! this was this mourning and i am still freaked out by it !
content.summary: I was outside talking to my stepson and looked up and seen a flock thought it was birds went in to get binoculars and noticed theywere not birds but air craft over 200 of them and then all of a sudden we both seen them all disappear

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i  were heading back to our home in bayridge after a get together, we got out of the cab at the baseball diamond and began walking through the field. we bother noticed the object because it was quite dark over top of the houses and it was very brightly illuminated and swerved into few very quickly (the colour was very similar to the sun). the object was at first about a few feet across, very clearly emitting light. it moved so quickly it seemed to leave a beam-trail behind it, like when they go into warp drive on star treck. it seemed to appear out of nowhere, it was heading north extremely fast than veered west and stopped for a moment. when it stopped the light went out, in the dark i could just see a circular very transparent blurr. seconds later it began emitting light, although the light was much smaller between the size of a base ball and a tennis ball. not a quarter of a second after it began glowing it propelled itself unbelievably quickly. it looked like a rock shot out of a slingshot how smoothly and quickly it moved, it flew high enough and fast enough for us to loose sight of it in less than 2 seconds. i felt happy when i saw it, it was the second time ive seen something like that and for some reason it comforted me. my girlfriend however was extremely freaked out and we agreed to walk along the street home instead of cutting through the field. when i first noticed the object i thought it might have been a firework until i realized i heard no sound and saw that it was travleling on an angle perpendicular to the ground at that moment i felt that it may be something spiritual but when it propelled off it was so unbeleivably fast  and fluid i realized it was something mechanical.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Me and my girlfriend saw a glowing orb zoom in, hover than propel off

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving my job at 9 pm, saturday, oct. 19th. as i walked towards the driveway that led to the parking lot, i saw 2 orange balls of light traveling towards me, from over geneva lake, at williams bay. they were traveling slowly towards me, i kept listening for copter blade noise, but there was none. i then thought the glowing brilliant orange globes are larger then a helicopter would be, so i felt very perplexed what it was , i was seeing. the orange balls of light then made a 90ÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ turn, and continued to move away from me until i could no longer see them . i was astonished at how blazing orange they were, and left wondering what i had just seen.
content.summary: Two orange balls of light travelled towards me, making no noise. then they altered paths and continued a path until they were out if my sight. they were intensely bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness reports seeing a "swirling, snake-like formation with bands of colour" at extreme range, approx 15 degrees above the horizon to the wsw. witness has sent copies of letters written at the time to an astronomer at lund university (to which he received no reply), a summary of the events, and two cds containing several dozen photos and videos.

witness is curious to find out what he might have seen.
content.summary: Point of light with trail and colour variations

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Please do not think im crazy but i see them every night. i have hours of footage but my cam corder is not that new so its not that great but good. but i know these objects going down behind houses,going straight down,side ways, and right angles is not normal. i can show you. preferable someone who really has not been in the spot light. i am starting to be scared for my family because they have not tried to communicate and weird things are happening to us. by every morning there are several directly above my home.I can explain more privately. im not sure if this is the right thing to do my son says not to contact anyone, hes scared we are all just unsure. also above is not my real name
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Triangle

content.detailedDescription: Saw a star light object move , straight line behind trees, on and off lights, flashed moved to my left, then it disappeared.
content.summary: Watched a star light move, flasheded behind trees move in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: For the right price we will share it is almost nightly

content.summary: Me and a friend firuged out what they are doing for a fact if there is money involved we will share are story and info took us year and half

content.detailedDescription:
Check the intersection of n. oak and 67th street in gladestone near the vienna square apartments. when a storm rolls through a perfect circle is punched through the clouds (as if something invisible about 50 ft in diameter) is left at the intersection straight up before a storm arrives. i've seen this cloud pattern twice with other witness' over a 5 year period. the second time i was with in 100 feet of the event but didn't see it happen. the clouds were a low level thin cloud about 100 feet off the ground over the intersection moving at a fast speed (40 mph heading south).  a perfect circle was punch through it only a few seconds before i noticed. no sound, no noise, no visual.  the circle of the open cloud was only a few feet further down the street from the time i noticed and stopped my conversation to see if i'm seeing it right. it was confirmed with a "it could be some signal from the radio tower near by" as a "i don't care" i took a moment to point out the flaws in his logic, but i went back to the prior conversation before he could think i was a true ufo believer.

if we have 'watchers' at that location than that's the perfect spot. it's a cop trap (human behavior watching) and has ambulances and fire trucks rolling through there all the time! not to mention a radio tower with in visual range. when any tornado rolls through, it goes right through that area. i'm just saying

as for the date, it is approximate. me and others lost power due to a transformer blow out next to the apartments that evening so we were just talking. i can't remember if it was before. it might have been the day after ... but that's about the time of this second event.
content.summary: Hole left in cloud twice in 5 year period before big storms

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home down bristol road at approximately 1:20 am due east south east when i noticed a bright light with the appearance of a star, but definitely way brighter than a star, brighter than any planet, opposite direction of the moon.  i immediately thought the light was strange.  i saw it for approximately 10 seconds before it completely vanished.  i saw it far in the distance with a great view because there is nothing but a field across from barness field.  i pulled up my compass on my iphone allowing me to know that it was north east in the sky no higher than 20 degrees. after i got home i drove back to the spot that i saw it with my dog(just in case) just to verify that there were no bright stars in the area.  there were only completely dark skies.  very clear night with absolutely no cloud coverage and beautiful views of the stars.  then when i got back home again and walked over to the fields behind tamanend middle school just to get a good view of the sky to keep my eyes open in case it happened to come back. my phones battery drained  very quickly to 20% from over 50% within 20 minutes then shut off from a dead battery. my guess is it was just the cold though only about 28 degrees out tonight.
content.summary: Driving down bristol road across from barness field. big open field no trees. it's a farm. bright light disapeared within 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Came outside through the front door to feel how cold it had gotten, as i looked up towards orien's belt and i saw blinking lights in red, green, blue, white above the neighbors tree across the street as i thought i was seeing a ufo. called my partner to come and verify the sighting. i seemed to just hover or stay in the origial place i saw the lights for about 20 minutes, then it moved a little towards the south and stayed there for about 10-15 mins. i got the binonculars out and my cell camera.  saw the lights blinking bright in binonulars and with my eyes without and with my glasses and took 2 pictures with my cell phone, checked my picture and the light is in it. my partner verified the blinking lights and agreed with me that i have seen my first ufo. i checked at 12:05 am and the object with lights had moved farther away towards the south. i was very excited to see the lights as was my partner. i came inside so i could not see the lights anymore. i checked outside again at 12:40 am and the bright blinking lights were hovering way under but in direct line with orien's belt.
content.summary: Saw object glowing red green blue white lights towards the east at 11:20pm

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shape, three lights one under the other. just like a the lght stop light.With the shape in the back ground.
content.summary: Cigar shape with three lights, one under the other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from moorpark tonight, passing through the la caÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩada flintridge area heading east on the 210 when suddenly i saw bright blue-white orb dart straight down across my vision in the near distance, about less than a mile from me on the opposite side of the freeway. it was perfectly round and did not blink or flash. it had a very pretty icy bright blue color. it was quick but graceful, flew effortlessly and was almost instantaneously gone from sight. like 1 or 1.5 seconds. i was sitting in the passenger seat coming back from a late meeting with clay's mom and i exclaimed, "whoa! what was that?!" because the object was so not a plane flying! it did not have a tail like a comet, nor did it fall and burn up like a falling star does. it freaking zipped across the sky! it was like the size of a nickel if you held one up at arms length... smaller than the moon, but bigger than a star. my boss was driving and she was afraid i saw something on the freeway so she looked to the road and did not see it in the sky. i said to her, ÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩthat was weird... that thing was not like a plane or a falling star" but then we kept talking and i was still thinking of it all the way home. 

hereÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩs where things get interesting... i get home, walk in my front door, and my husband jumps up from his computer all excited and says, "babe, i just saw a ufo!" and i say, "i just saw it too!" and my husband asked, "what color was it?" and i said "blue" and then clay proceeded to explain exactly to a tee what i had just seen; only he saw it about 15-20 minutes later than i did in upland, ca. this is my second ufo sighting in my lifetime! (my first is a much longer story from when i was a little girl in ulupalakua, maui)
content.summary: Bright blue white spherical orb darts across night sky and dissapears

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to bluefield state college from my home outside of beckley wv. after passing the flat top underpass headed southbound on i-77 i decided to take pictures of the mountains with the fog settled into them. you can see for probably 60 miles the elevation is a lot higher than the surrounding areas. i snapped a few shots down the mountain at which on point the suns bright rays nearly blinded me (so i believe). as i approach the bottom of the dip i thought i seen something with my peripheral vision down behind the trees but thought nothing of it till i got home. on that evening i was uploading pictures from my phone onto my pc. first i noticed the ball of light in the last pictures and the bright light i thought was the sun. checked a couple pictures before and noticed an object fly east(right to left in the picture) and drop from the clouds behind the mountains. in the later pictures there is a light so bright you can hardly make out anything in the picture. then there is a ball of light heading left to right (then flying south/southeast). had some kind of red something coming off the sides which i don't know if it was caused by the bright flash of light onto the lens of the camera on the phone. the object continued to move in the same direction and drop behind the trees seen in the last picture. that is when i seen something out of the corner of my eye. i never seen this thing the whole time i was driving and was amazed when i went through my pictures. my truck window was down so i know it was not a reflection. the first (black) object in pictures i believe to be the same object seen in the last pictures. i believe the suns light was reflecting off of it making it appear as if it were glowing. i know for a fact it was not a plane or helicopter from experience working at atlanta national airways (ga), dulles airport(md), and oceana naval base (va).
content.summary: Black objecet flys west to east then close up southwest. emitted bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a white orb coming from the moon. the sky was still very blue at 15:44. the sky was so blue, and it was full daylight so it was not a star or planet. it moved from the moon to the left and then stopped. then it started moving down and then stopped. it appeared to come from the moon or from in front of the moon. this is when i ran inside to grab my video camera. by the time i ran back outside, the orb had moved diagonally to the left and down away from the moon in the "7 o'clock" position. this is when i hit record and captured it for 2 minutes and 10 seconds before it just vanished into thin air. 
i used my sony hxr-nx30u video camera. 
you can clearly see the orb in my attached video. i did not edit the video in any way. it's just raw footage. please enhance the video by 300% or zooming in to see the orb. 
i was the person in the video filming, and i was asking if my grandfather saw it but he said something about his eyes so he didn't see it until i showed him the video.
my camera was set to 1920 x 1080 60p.
look at the 15-16 second mark as it moves rapidly.
then again look at the 21 second mark, the object begins to clearly move from a stationary position. definitely watch the orb between seconds 15-16 and 21-23, it moves position rapidly then stops again.
definitely not of this world. please share.
-thanks
-jeremy nolen
content.summary: It came off of the moon in daylight hours

content.detailedDescription: Driving down us 30 west, saw two orange objects traveling in a southwestern trajectory. the objects were over the commercial area in merrillville.
content.summary: Orange lights over merrillville

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30 pm on november 7, 2013, i looked out my patio door to the north. above a 2 story house on the next block were lights that looked the size of a frisbee. they were red at first, then rotated closkwise and changed to green, then rotated again and changed to white. the were red longer than green or white. at about 11:00 pm, i went outside toward the house but the lights seemed abostructed by trees so i went home. this was still happening when i went to bed at midnight. i never saw those lights before nor since. (i called my husband over to look at the lights & he saw them too.)
content.summary: I saw lights turn clockwise & change color from red to green to white, repeatedly

content.detailedDescription:
Walking the dog on our street in sarasota fl. i looked up to see a group of orange objects moving west in a cluster like a loss diamond maybe 10. this was the leading edge of a long trail of singles and small groups maybe 3 or so trailing from the east. in the whole lot about 20 to 25.

by the time i got my camera from the house to take the accompany picture only 4 were left that i circled in green. 
nothing on the local tv wwsb in sarasota

how did i feel wow. waiting a long time to see something like this like 78 years. my wife came out of the house and also seen them.
i am a professional photographer by trade.

lat and lon
n 27-15-17.6
w 82-29-31.5

just a little south of the above coordinates.
content.summary: Glowing objects in a long line moving slow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking on a trash fire we had started at midnight to make sure it wasnt getting out of control before going to bed.

as i pulled up in the pickup me and my brother in law saw it in the distance.


north of the new central valley ag near royal ne.   what looked to be a large triangle of light on its side like a sail.   emitting a massive amount of light white and yellow in color and it was very large.  estimated about 1000 agl  estimated about 1000 foot wide estimated about 3-4ish miles away.

originally suspected it was combine lights however it was soon realized it was off the surface .. it was far away and it was massive..  the light started to dim.  then red and orange orbs showed up on the bottom on a line maybe 4-5 of them..  then they flickered and dimed to nothing from the first sight until it was completely gone was about 2-3 min
content.summary: Bright triangle emitting yellow and white light fading to red orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was rolling my cigarette to go for a smoke at about 16:00 i opened my backdoor to go outside,i looked across the sky as i usually do, and there was this white oval object that didn't change shape or size but flew in a straight line towards a small cloud behind a house that cut off my view from it,it was roughly the length of a plane but it flew higher, i know this because a plane flew the opposite direction more lower than the object, i was hoping to see it again after it flew behind the house  as it was the direction it was flying, however it didn't it just disappeared in the clouds,
i didn't feel any different from seeing it, it was more of an awe like a "wow" feeling mixed with "wtf!?" as it was different after i knew it went i rushed to the internet and typed in "what to do if you see a ufo for real" i ended up on mufon because i needed to tell someone quickly, and now im feeling a little bit curious. i know its legit because i saw it and i could draw it whenever wherever with whatever i can, it was real, i saw a ufo.
content.summary: I looked out the back of my house and in the sky was a white oval shaped object that floated seamlessly across the sky, then a plane lower than the object flew past it as it disappeared in the clouds out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was attending a team meeting in pennsauken,nj that day which was 11/6/13. i left work around 3:30 pm and went across the betsy ross bridge to take 95 s towards delaware county. while approaching center city philadelphia at approximately 3:40 pm i saw what looked like a funnel cloud forming over center city so i started taking pictures as i was driving. the funnel cloud started to balloon into more of an upside down tear drop shape and what looked like a large orb started to emerge from behind it. the orb hovered for a few seconds then appeared to moved toward 95 as it descended. i then noticed many smaller orbs descend to the same area. i continued to take pictures as the smaller orbs followed the large orb back into the funnel cloud and then the entire funnel cloud instantly shoot above the rest of the clouds leaving what looked to be some type of propulsion trail in the sky... the entire event was no more than  5 - 10 minutes.
content.summary: Strange looking funnel cloud emitting orb like structures then vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en mi huerto a 500 metros del pueblo, oÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ una avioneta y mirÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ al cielo a ver si la avistaba, me tape la luz del sol con la mano, y vi un objeto blanco que se desplazaba a gran velocidad en direcciÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩn se/ne, podÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩa ser un content.detailedDescription: My cell phone wont download my video. ive tried several times and my phone disconnects from the internet or shuts off. i was able to download it to my facebook page. i dont know why it wont download here. the video i have will knock your socks off. its not only creepy but has some sound to go along with it. ive seen this thing numerous times in the past 3 years. i have still pictures of the first time i saw it also.I saw 2 diamonds that glowed when i first saw it 3 yrs ago. the video is amazing. someone needs to see this video besides me. the video is not edited in anyway. i dont know how to do that stuff anyway. i just want someone to see what i deal with on a daily basis during the warmer months at my home. just this week i moved to another house i bought. hopefully to never see this thing again. the video is well worth your time to see. maybe i could get it sent to another cell phone or maybe you can just watch it from my facebook page. i dont know why it wont download here. but i have it if you would like to see it. i just want to know what the heck it is and why its in my yard the last 3 years. id like help with this issue please. thank you...Pj tucker
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Peeping\buzzing sounds with lights. it flys towards me everytime it sees me

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i went for a walk on a new freeway that was under construction, it was about 1/2 mile from my house. my family was moving from ca to de in about a week so it was the last time we would be able to have a nice walk in the santa anna winds. the wind was blowing 25-30 mph, we loved walking in high winds it felt great. we walked about a mile or so and was in the middle of some good conversation when i saw a very bright red star about 80 degrees up in front of us. we kept walking not really thinking much of it, a few minutes later i looked up again and it was getting bigger. i said something to my friend about it and we both kept an eye on it while walking. at this point we both had our attention on the very large red star that was moving and quickly decreasing altitude. we watched the ufo drop down to about 300-400 ft off the ground and about 1/4 mile away. it was hovering over a box canyon we rode our motorcycles in frequently, we called it the ladera jumps because we would ride up the sides and fly over the top of the canyon walls.
it was dark out about 8:30 or 9:00 in the evening and we had not spotted anybody on this freeway but us. normally we had to hide from the security patrol when ever we walked on this stretch of road. of course when we would have loved to see their truck come along this night, no truck. well we watched it slowly move from one end to the other end of the box canyon and then we were shocked to see it come over the freeway that we were on and drop down to 200-300 ft off the road. our nerves started to get the best of us when it started to come our way. it hovered with no noise at all while the wind was so strong we had to lean into it to stay on our feet. when it got almost directly above our heads we freaked out and ran the other direction. we were on a overpass at the time so we ran to the corner where it was only about a 10ft drop off the ground and jumped. as soon as our feet hit the ground we ran under the overpass and stayed there for a bit, i kept peeking out to see if it was still above us. i can not tell how long we stayed under the overpass both of us were shook up. when we got enough nerve to come out it was gone or so we thought. 
we climbed back up on to the road and started looking all over the place trying to spot  it. about 1/2 mile away was a sheep herd that was brought in to keep the wild wheat down during fire season. we spotted the ufo it had gone over a small hill over the sheep and now it was slowly increasing altitude like it was in slow motion. when it was 200-300 ft high it slowly tilted on an angle until we could see through the dome on top of the ufo. inside in red light we could see the outline of 2 or 3 humanoid shapes. it increased altitude to 500-600 ft and took off so fast it was gone in seconds. the ufo was the  typical disc shape but on the bottom like a ring around the outside it had lights about 3-4ft wide that would change different colors, all the colors of the rainbow,it was like a wave flowing around the base.

my wife and family have been the only people i have ever told about my experience. sept 1970 thousand oaks ca changed my life for ever,its finally off my chest and it does feel good.
content.summary: Friend and i saw bright red star that kept getting bigger overhead. watched ufo desend over a box canyon 1/4 mile away about 3-400 ft high. it slowly moved our direction untill it was almost directly overhead and 200 ft high. we jumped off the road hide

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car and it followed me. it has been following me or seems to be.

i don't remember when i first noticed it. i thought i might be something i was seeing due to stress.  i thought it was a meteor shower.

it would hover then dance in a clockwise motion then hover then move towards me in a straight path. then it would disappear and reappear. this has happened on many occasions.

i am highly educated and i collected as much evidence as possible.

i have been recording as much as i can when possible. it has been visible night and day. i told people who all decided that i need a psychiatric evaluation.

i continue to see the objects and i am sick of people being so wrapped up in their selfish motives and iphones that they don't listen to anything i say. 

i have not had time to watch all the videos i will post them tomorrow.

thank you for being truthful and open minded.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange balls of light that i have seen for 2 months on many occasions i have videos of some of them

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving krogers on michigan and greenfield, riding with my mom sister and son. we got to schaefer and my mom, the driver said omg what are those three lights in the sky just sitting there they're really low. it was not too far from pizza hut when i looked up and seen it and started snapping pics then it got higher in the sky and moved quickly sw. we made a u turn before wyoming right by the 94 free way when we went back all we saw were regular lights in the sky light helicopters and airplanes. once i zoom on on the pictures it appears to be 4 light like it changed from one big object to the 4 smaller ones.
content.summary: It was sitting low in the sky near michigan and schaefer then began to move sw then disappeared. i have photos.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in the car on our way back from walmart then from wendy's. i was in the car eating chili and looking out the window. that was when i noticed the lights. there were four white round lights froming a diamond shape. then suddenly there were three. the lights were not like normal lights though. they were like fading down. after that they were then covered by clouds. my husband only saw a glimpse of it though since he was driving, and it all happened so fast.
content.summary: In the car and looking out the window when about 3-4 white lights forming a diamond shape was seen in the sky, but then it was covered by a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, 11/10/2013, in deltona, florida, about 20 miles ne of orlando. stopped at the dollar tree at 8:00 pm. noticed a bright orange "fireball" approaching from over the dupont lakes plaza behind me. as my family and i got out of the car, we were discussing the exact same object we saw 6 months earlier, almost in the same location. (the object was traveling in a different direction the first time) the object flew right over us at jet aircraft speeds, in a straight line. not to be confused with a meteor, space debris, or chinese lanterns. right behind it, 3 of the same objects flew the same trajectory in staggered military formation, such as you would see with 4 blackhawk helicopters flying over. the objects looked like fireballs with no plume, like a rocket or missile might have. again, they were not chinese lanterns, although they looked similar. they were flying horizon to horizon at jet speeds. no sound at all! the objects were moving from ne toward sw paralleling the i-4 corridor. a straight line would have taken them from the atlantic ocean, over daytona speedway directly over deltona, sanford, then orlando. filmed one of the objects next to the moon.
content.summary: 4 bright orange fireballs moving in military formation at jet speeds in straight line
